definition: Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
currency unit (esp. Chinese yuan)/first/original/primary/fundamental/constituent/part/era (of a reign)/meta- (prefix)/(math.) argument/variable/(Tw) (geology) eon
surname Yuan/the Yuan or Mongol dynasty (1279-1368)
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
morning

sentences.english: Question in this place we go where the jurisdiction of the Yuan Dynasty, when?
sentences.chinese: 提問我們這個地方在元朝時歸哪裏管轄？

sentences.english: Yuan Yuan twenty-eight years in July, the court approved the construction of an independent county town of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 元朝至元二十八年七月，朝廷同意上海鎮建獨立縣。

sentences.english: In the middle of Yuan Dynasty, the terracotta technology in CiZao reached its peak.
sentences.chinese: 元朝中葉，磁竈製陶技術達到鼎盛時期。

sentences.english: According to popular belief, the custom of eating mooncakes began in the late Yuan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 民間認爲，喫月餅的習俗始於元朝末期。

sentences.english: How many names of ZhengYangmen are called since the Yuan dynasty?
sentences.chinese: 正陽門從元朝開始共經歷了幾個名字？

sentences.english: The only one ancient county government saved so completely, which was built in Yuan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 全國唯一保存完整的郡府級衙門，始建於元朝。

sentences.english: The original scroll is the work of Yuan-dynasty painter Huang Gongwang.
sentences.chinese: 《富春山居圖》的原圖是元朝畫家黃公望創作的。

sentences.english: The main literary achievement in the Yuan Dynasty was Yuan drama.
sentences.chinese: 元朝文學的主要成就是元曲。

sentences.english: Jin replaced both front of palace of Inspection Division, and the Yuan dynasty, no.
sentences.chinese: 金朝改爲殿前都點檢司，而元朝不設。

sentences.english: During the Yuan Dynasty, all the minorities in the northwest of our country belonged to the Selu people.
sentences.chinese: 元朝時候，我國西北地區的少數民族都屬於色目人。

sentences.english: The correlative data also indicates that the production of distilling liquor started before Yuan Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 據相關資料表明，在我國元朝以前就有蒸餾酒生產。

sentences.english: The Yuan era brimmed with diverse cultures and religions.
sentences.chinese: 元朝是各種宗教和文化異彩紛呈的時代。

sentences.english: The geneses emperor of Yuan Dynasty, he is also the fifth generation Mongolia big sweat.
sentences.chinese: 元朝的開創皇帝，他也是第五代的蒙古年夜汗。

sentences.english: To the Yuan Dynasty, Ding finally and gradually disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 到了元朝，定窯終於逐漸沒落。

sentences.english: Qijuzhu is an important part of official compiling history in the Yuan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 起居注是元朝官方史學中的重要一環。

definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)

Jin Dynasty (1115-1234), founded by the Jurchen 女真[Nu:3 zhen1] people of North China, a precursor of the Mongol Yuan Dynasty
the Southern Song dynasty (1127-1279)
Song Dynasty (960-1279)/also Song of Southern dynasties 南朝宋 (420-479)
Ming Taizu, Temple name of first Ming emperor Hongwu 洪武[Hong2 wu3]
the early Ming (i.e. from second half of 14th century)
Ch'ing or Qing dynasty (1644-1911)
final years of Yuan dynasty (1279-1368)/mid 14th century
Sui dynasty (581-617)
lit. progenitor of the Yuan Dynasty (1279-1368), title of Khubilai Khan (1215-1294), first Yuan dynasty emperor, reigned 1260-1294

Tang dynasty (618-907)
Ming Chengzu, Temple name of third Ming Emperor Yongle 永樂|永乐[Yong3 le4]
the Northern Song Dynasty (960-1127)
